content.content: We need to remove the counter feature, and Write me an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, consisting of multiple pages with sliding transitions. Include the following pages, each containing these exact phrases: 1. Welcome page: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.' 2. Authentication options page: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email' 3. Phone number input page: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number' 4. Verification code page: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567' 5. Email collection page: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address' 6. Welcome confirmation page: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs' 7. Terms and conditions page: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.' Ensure each page has a 'Next' or 'Continue' button to progress through the flow, and use 'Gyde' branding throughout.
content.summarized_content:
ChangeRequest:
  RemoveFeature: 
    - Counter
  NewFeature:
    - OnboardingFlow:
        AppName: Gyde
        Pages:
          - WelcomePage:
              Text: 'Get Started', 'Experience luxury travel with ease. Register and manage your bookings seamlessly.'
              Button: 'Next'
          - AuthenticationOptionsPage:
              Text: 'Continue with Phone', 'Continue with Email'
              Button: 'Next'
          - PhoneNumberInputPage:
              Text: 'Add Your Phone', 'Enter your phone number to get yourself verified and ready to start your ride.', 'Phone Number'
              Button: 'Next'
          - VerificationCodePage:
              Text: 'Enter Code', 'We sent verification code to your phone number +65 8123 4567'
              Button: 'Next'
          - EmailCollectionPage:
              Text: 'Stay Connected', 'To provide you with tailored services and updates, please share your email with us.', 'Email Address'
              Button: 'Next'
          - WelcomeConfirmationPage:
              Text: 'Welcome Aboard!', 'You've unlocked access to exclusive, personalized chauffeur services with Gyde.', 'Experience comfort, Tailored to your needs'
              Button: 'Continue'
          - TermsAndConditionsPage:
              Text: 'By continuing, you have read and agree to our terms and condition.', 'Please read these terms of use carefully before using this platform', 'Welcome to Gyde! By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.'
              Button: 'Continue'
        Branding: 'Gyde'

content.overview: The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde. This includes adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and specific branding requirements.
new_features: Welcome Page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
Authentication Options Page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'
Phone Number Input Page with phone verification instructions
Verification Code Page for entering the received code
Email Collection Page for gathering user email addresses
Welcome Confirmation Page with a welcome message and service description
Terms and Conditions Page with agreement text
modified_features: Update navigation flow to include new onboarding pages
Adjust app.router.dart to handle new routes for onboarding
removed_features: Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
content.architectural_changes: The routing setup in app.router.dart will be updated to accommodate the new onboarding flow, ensuring smooth transitions between the new pages. Dependency injection may need adjustments to support any new services required for the onboarding process.
cross_cutting_concerns: Ensure consistent Gyde branding across all new onboarding pages
Implement sliding transitions for smooth navigation between onboarding pages
Update state management to handle new onboarding logic and user data collection

content.summarized_content:
overview: 
  - The application will undergo significant changes to remove the existing counter feature and introduce a new onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde.
  - This includes adding multiple onboarding pages with sliding transitions and specific branding requirements.
new_features: 
  - Welcome Page with 'Get Started' and introductory text
  - Authentication Options Page with 'Continue with Phone' and 'Continue with Email'
  - Phone Number Input Page with phone verification instructions
  - Verification Code Page for entering the received code
  - Email Collection Page for gathering user email addresses
  - Welcome Confirmation Page with a welcome message and service description
  - Terms and Conditions Page with agreement text
modified_features: 
  - Update navigation flow to include new onboarding pages
  - Adjust app.router.dart to handle new routes for onboarding
removed_features: 
  - Counter feature from HomeView and HomeViewModel
architectural_changes: 
  - The routing setup in app.router.dart will be updated to accommodate the new onboarding flow, ensuring smooth transitions between the new pages.
  - Dependency injection may need adjustments to support any new services required for the onboarding process.
cross_cutting_concerns: 
  - Ensure consistent Gyde branding across all new onboarding pages
  - Implement sliding transitions for smooth navigation between onboarding pages
  - Update state management to handle new onboarding logic and user data collection
